name: Gateway Activation
description: With the Nepian threat neutralized and all the required components gathered, we can now attempt to activate the gateway to the Crystalline Empire's ruins. This is a delicate operation that requires precise timing and the right energy signature. I need you to activate the gateway and secure the passage.
requirements: Narvark wants you to activate the mine gateway to the Crystalline Empire
completiontext: The gateway is active! The dimensional passage to the Crystalline Empire's ruins is now open. I can feel the ancient magic flowing through the portal. We're ready to explore the Empire's ruins and learn the secrets of the Reality Anchors.
